Type Definitions.html#/c:PTPVBlocks.h@T@.name: PTPVErrorBlock
Type Definitions.html#/c:PTPVBlocks.h@T@.abstract: A callback that will be run with the error response from the API.

Type Definitions.html#/c:PTPVBlocks.h@T@.name: PTPVAddUserCompletionBlock
Type Definitions.html#/c:PTPVBlocks.h@T@.abstract: A callback that will be run with the user response from the API.

Type Definitions.html#/c:PTPVBlocks.h@T@.name: PTPVAddUserTokenCompletionBlock
Type Definitions.html#/c:PTPVBlocks.h@T@.abstract: A callback that will be run with the user response from the API.

Type Definitions.html#/c:PTPVBlocks.h@T@.name: PTPVInfoUserCompletionBlock
Type Definitions.html#/c:PTPVBlocks.h@T@.abstract: A callback that will be run with the card response from the API.

Type Definitions.html#/c:PTPVBlocks.h@T@.name: PTPVRemoveUserCompletionBlock
Type Definitions.html#/c:PTPVBlocks.h@T@.abstract: A callback that will be run with the response from the API.

Type Definitions.html#/c:PTPVBlocks.h@T@.name: PTPVExecutePurchaseCompletionBlock
Type Definitions.html#/c:PTPVBlocks.h@T@.abstract: A callback that will be run with the purchase response from the API.

Type Definitions.html#/c:PTPVBlocks.h@T@.name: PTPVExecutePurchaseDCCCompletionBlock
Type Definitions.html#/c:PTPVBlocks.h@T@.abstract: A callback that will be run with the dcc details response from the API.

Type Definitions.html#/c:PTPVBlocks.h@T@.name: PTPVConfirmPurchaseDCCCompletionBlock
Type Definitions.html#/c:PTPVBlocks.h@T@.abstract: A callback that will be run with the purchase response from the API.

Type Definitions.html#/c:PTPVBlocks.h@T@.name: PTPVExecuteRefundCompletionBlock
Type Definitions.html#/c:PTPVBlocks.h@T@.abstract: A callback that will be run with the refund response from the API.

Type Definitions.html#/c:PTPVBlocks.h@T@.name: PTPVCreateSubscriptionCompletionBlock
Type Definitions.html#/c:PTPVBlocks.h@T@.abstract: A callback that will be run with the subscription response from the API.

Type Definitions.html#/c:PTPVBlocks.h@T@.name: PTPVEditSubscriptionCompletionBlock
Type Definitions.html#/c:PTPVBlocks.h@T@.abstract: A callback that will be run with the subscription response from the API.

Type Definitions.html#/c:PTPVBlocks.h@T@.name: PTPVRemoveSubscriptionCompletionBlock
Type Definitions.html#/c:PTPVBlocks.h@T@.abstract: A callback that will be run with the response from the API.

Type Definitions.html#/c:PTPVBlocks.h@T@.name: PTPVCreateSubscriptionTokenCompletionBlock
Type Definitions.html#/c:PTPVBlocks.h@T@.abstract: A callback that will be run with the subscription response from the API.

Type Definitions.html#/c:PTPVBlocks.h@T@.name: PTPVCreatePreauthorizationCompletionBlock
Type Definitions.html#/c:PTPVBlocks.h@T@.abstract: A callback that will be run with the purchase response from the API.

Type Definitions.html#/c:PTPVBlocks.h@T@.name: PTPVConfirmPreauthorizationCompletionBlock
Type Definitions.html#/c:PTPVBlocks.h@T@.abstract: A callback that will be run with the purchase response from the API.

Type Definitions.html#/c:PTPVBlocks.h@T@.name: PTPVCancelPreauthorizationCompletionBlock
Type Definitions.html#/c:PTPVBlocks.h@T@.abstract: A callback that will be run with the purchase response from the API.

Protocols/PTPVAPIResponseDecodable.html#.name: +decodedObjectFromAPIResponse:
Protocols/PTPVAPIResponseDecodable.html#.abstract: Decodes the given NSDictionary to a concrete object

Protocols/PTPVAPIResponseDecodable.html#.name: originalResponse
Protocols/PTPVAPIResponseDecodable.html#.abstract: Contains all the parameters received from the API

Protocols/PTPVAPIResponseDecodable.html.name: PTPVAPIResponseDecodable
Protocols/PTPVAPIResponseDecodable.html.abstract: Protocol for decoding an NSDictionary to a concrete object

Protocols/PTPVNSDictionaryEncodable.html.name: PTPVNSDictionaryEncodable
Protocols/PTPVNSDictionaryEncodable.html.abstract: Protocol for encoding an object to NSDictionary

Classes/PTPVUser.html#/c:objc(cs)PTPVUse.name: idUser
Classes/PTPVUser.html#/c:objc(cs)PTPVUse.abstract: Unique identifier of the user registered in the system

Classes/PTPVSubscriptionDetails.html#/c:.name: idUser
Classes/PTPVSubscriptionDetails.html#/c:.abstract: Unique identifier of the user registered in the system. It will come back empty in the case of error.

Classes/PTPVSubscriptionDetails.html#/c:.name: amount
Classes/PTPVSubscriptionDetails.html#/c:.abstract: Amount of the operation in integer format. 1.00 EURO = 100, 4.50 EUROS = 450…

Classes/PTPVSubscriptionDetails.html#/c:.name: order
Classes/PTPVSubscriptionDetails.html#/c:.abstract: Original reference of the operation + [DS_IDUSER] + date of the transaction in format YYYYMMDD.

Classes/PTPVSubscriptionDetails.html#/c:.name: currency
Classes/PTPVSubscriptionDetails.html#/c:.abstract: Currency of the transaction. - see: more details at http://developers.paytpv.com/en/documentacion/monedas . - see: PTPVCurrency

Classes/PTPVSubscriptionDetails.html#/c:.name: cardCountry
Classes/PTPVSubscriptionDetails.html#/c:.abstract: Country of the issuer of the card in ISO3 Code (ex.: 724 = Spain). May be left empty.

Classes/PTPVSubscriptionDetails.html#/c:.name: -user
Classes/PTPVSubscriptionDetails.html#/c:.abstract: Returns a user with the details in the subscription

Classes/PTPVSubscription.html#/c:objc(cs.name: startDate
Classes/PTPVSubscription.html#/c:objc(cs.abstract: Subscription start date. If the value is empty the date is the same day of registration. The format of the date is YYYY-MM-DD.

Classes/PTPVSubscription.html#/c:objc(cs.name: endDate
Classes/PTPVSubscription.html#/c:objc(cs.abstract: Subscription end date. It may not be later than the Subscription start date + 5 years. The format of the date is YYYY-MM-DD.

Classes/PTPVSubscription.html#/c:objc(cs.name: order
Classes/PTPVSubscription.html#/c:objc(cs.abstract: First characters of the reference of the operation.

Classes/PTPVSubscription.html#/c:objc(cs.name: periodicity
Classes/PTPVSubscription.html#/c:objc(cs.abstract: Frequency of collection from the start date. The number expresses Days. It may not be greater than 365 days.

Classes/PTPVSubscription.html#/c:objc(cs.name: amount
Classes/PTPVSubscription.html#/c:objc(cs.abstract: Amount of the operation in integer format. 1.00 EURO = 100, 4.50 EUROS = 450…

Classes/PTPVSubscription.html#/c:objc(cs.name: currency
Classes/PTPVSubscription.html#/c:objc(cs.abstract: Currency of the transaction. - see: more details at http://developers.paytpv.com/en/documentacion/monedas . - see: PTPVCurrency

Classes/PTPVSubscription.html#/c:objc(cs.name: scoring
Classes/PTPVSubscription.html#/c:objc(cs.abstract: Risk score of the transaction. Between 0 and 100

Classes/PTPVResponse.html#/c:objc(cs)PTP.name: result
Classes/PTPVResponse.html#/c:objc(cs)PTP.abstract: Result of operation. 0 or empty will be erroneous operation and 1 operation completed.

Classes/PTPVRefund.html#/c:objc(cs)PTPVR.name: authCode
Classes/PTPVRefund.html#/c:objc(cs)PTPVR.abstract: Original bank code of the authorization of the transaction

Classes/PTPVRefund.html#/c:objc(cs)PTPVR.name: currency
Classes/PTPVRefund.html#/c:objc(cs)PTPVR.abstract: Currency of the transaction. - see: more details at http://developers.paytpv.com/en/documentacion/monedas . - see: PTPVCurrency

Classes/PTPVRefund.html#/c:objc(cs)PTPVR.name: amount
Classes/PTPVRefund.html#/c:objc(cs)PTPVR.abstract: For partial refunds. Amount to be refunded in integer format. 1.00 EURO = 100, 4.50 EUROS = 450…

Classes/PTPVPurchaseRequest.html#/c:objc.name: -initWithAmount:order:currency:productDescription:owner:scoring:
Classes/PTPVPurchaseRequest.html#/c:objc.abstract: Creates a PTPVPurchaseRequest. Used when executing a purchase.

Classes/PTPVPurchaseRequest.html#/c:objc.name: -initDCCWithAmount:order:productDescription:owner:
Classes/PTPVPurchaseRequest.html#/c:objc.abstract: Creates a PTPVPurchaseRequest. Used when executing a Dynamic currency conversion purchase.

Classes/PTPVPurchaseRequest.html#/c:objc.name: amount
Classes/PTPVPurchaseRequest.html#/c:objc.abstract: Amount of the operation in integer format. 1.00 EURO = 100, 4.50 EUROS = 450…

Classes/PTPVPurchaseRequest.html#/c:objc.name: order
Classes/PTPVPurchaseRequest.html#/c:objc.abstract: Reference of the operation. Must be unique on every valid transaction

Classes/PTPVPurchaseRequest.html#/c:objc.name: currency
Classes/PTPVPurchaseRequest.html#/c:objc.abstract: Currency of the transaction. - see: more details at http://developers.paytpv.com/en/documentacion/monedas . - see: PTPVCurrency

Classes/PTPVPurchaseRequest.html#/c:objc.name: scoring
Classes/PTPVPurchaseRequest.html#/c:objc.abstract: Risk score of the transaction. Between 0 and 100

Classes/PTPVPurchase.html#/c:objc(cs)PTP.name: amount
Classes/PTPVPurchase.html#/c:objc(cs)PTP.abstract: Amount of the operation in integer format. 1.00 EURO = 100, 4.50 EUROS = 450…

Classes/PTPVPurchase.html#/c:objc(cs)PTP.name: currency
Classes/PTPVPurchase.html#/c:objc(cs)PTP.abstract: Currency of the transaction. - see: more details at http://developers.paytpv.com/en/documentacion/monedas . - see: PTPVCurrency

Classes/PTPVPurchase.html#/c:objc(cs)PTP.name: authCode
Classes/PTPVPurchase.html#/c:objc(cs)PTP.abstract: Authorization bank code of the transaction (required to execute a return).

Classes/PTPVPurchase.html#/c:objc(cs)PTP.name: cardCountry
Classes/PTPVPurchase.html#/c:objc(cs)PTP.abstract: Country of the issuer of the card in ISO3 Code (ex.: 724 = Spain). May be left empty.

Classes/PTPVPurchase.html#/c:objc(cs)PTP.name: result
Classes/PTPVPurchase.html#/c:objc(cs)PTP.abstract: Result of operation. 0 or empty will be erroneous operation and 1 operation completed.

Classes/PTPVPreauthorization.html#/c:obj.name: order
Classes/PTPVPreauthorization.html#/c:obj.abstract: Reference operation. Should be that identified the original preauthorization.

Classes/PTPVPreauthorization.html#/c:obj.name: amount
Classes/PTPVPreauthorization.html#/c:obj.abstract: Amount of the operation in integer format. 1.00 EURO = 100, 4.50 EUROS = 450…

Classes/PTPVDCCDetails.html#/c:objc(cs)P.name: amount
Classes/PTPVDCCDetails.html#/c:objc(cs)P.abstract: Amount of the operation in integer format. 1.00 EURO = 100, 4.50 EUROS = 450…

Classes/PTPVDCCDetails.html#/c:objc(cs)P.name: currency
Classes/PTPVDCCDetails.html#/c:objc(cs)P.abstract: Transaction currency. It will always be the same as the original product.

Classes/PTPVDCCDetails.html#/c:objc(cs)P.name: dccSession
Classes/PTPVDCCDetails.html#/c:objc(cs)P.abstract: Session var for later confirmation of the authorization. This value must be stored to confirm payment in the currency chosen by the end user.

Classes/PTPVDCCDetails.html#/c:objc(cs)P.name: dccCurrencyISO3
Classes/PTPVDCCDetails.html#/c:objc(cs)P.abstract: Native currency of the customer’s card in ISO3

Classes/PTPVDCCDetails.html#/c:objc(cs)P.name: dccCurrencyName
Classes/PTPVDCCDetails.html#/c:objc(cs)P.abstract: Literal currency in string. If the native currency is the same as the product PAYTPV, this field will come with value 0.

Classes/PTPVDCCDetails.html#/c:objc(cs)P.name: dccExchange
Classes/PTPVDCCDetails.html#/c:objc(cs)P.abstract: Currency exchange rate. Return string but it will come in float format.

Classes/PTPVDCCDetails.html#/c:objc(cs)P.name: dccAmount
Classes/PTPVDCCDetails.html#/c:objc(cs)P.abstract: Amount of the operation in whole format. 1,00 EURO = 100, 4,50 EUROS = 450…

Classes/PTPVDCCDetails.html#/c:objc(cs)P.name: dccMarkup
Classes/PTPVDCCDetails.html#/c:objc(cs)P.abstract: Percentage value in float of DCC margin applied by the financial institution. For example: 0.03 will be 3%

Classes/PTPVDCCDetails.html#/c:objc(cs)P.name: dccCardCountry
Classes/PTPVDCCDetails.html#/c:objc(cs)P.abstract: Country of the issuer of the card in ISO3 Code (ex.: 724 = Spain).

Classes/PTPVDCCDetails.html#/c:objc(cs)P.name: result
Classes/PTPVDCCDetails.html#/c:objc(cs)P.abstract: Result of operation. 0 or empty will be erroneous operation and 1 operation completed.

Classes/PTPVDCCConfirmation.html#/c:objc.name: currency
Classes/PTPVDCCConfirmation.html#/c:objc.abstract: Currency of the chosen transaction. It can be the PAYTPV product or the native one selected by the end user. The amount will be sent in execute_purchase_dcc if it is the same as the product and the converted one in case it is different.

Classes/PTPVDCCConfirmation.html#/c:objc.name: session
Classes/PTPVDCCConfirmation.html#/c:objc.abstract: The session sent in the execute_purchase_dcc process.

Classes/PTPVCard.html#/c:objc(cs)PTPVCar.name: pan
Classes/PTPVCard.html#/c:objc(cs)PTPVCar.abstract: Card number, without any spaces or dashes.

Classes/PTPVCard.html#/c:objc(cs)PTPVCar.name: expiryDate
Classes/PTPVCard.html#/c:objc(cs)PTPVCar.abstract: Expiry date of the card, expressed as “mmyy” (two-digits for the month and two-digits for the year).

Classes/PTPVCard.html#/c:objc(cs)PTPVCar.name: country
Classes/PTPVCard.html#/c:objc(cs)PTPVCar.abstract: ISO3 Code the country of the issuer of the card.

Classes/PTPVAPIClient.html#/c:objc(cs)PT.name: +sharedClient
Classes/PTPVAPIClient.html#/c:objc(cs)PT.abstract: A shared singleton API client.

Classes/PTPVAPIClient.html#/c:objc(cs)PT.name: -initWithConfiguration:
Classes/PTPVAPIClient.html#/c:objc(cs)PT.abstract: Creates an API client with the given configuration.

Classes/PTPVAPIClient.html#/c:objc(cs)PT.name: configuration
Classes/PTPVAPIClient.html#/c:objc(cs)PT.abstract: The client’s configuration.

Classes/PTPVAPIClient.html#/c:objc(cs)PT.name: -addUser:completion:
Classes/PTPVAPIClient.html#/c:objc(cs)PT.abstract: Add a card to PAYTPV.

Classes/PTPVAPIClient.html#/c:objc(cs)PT.name: -addUserWithJETToken:completion:
Classes/PTPVAPIClient.html#/c:objc(cs)PT.abstract: Registers a user based on a token previously obtained trough the solution BankStore JET. - see: http://developers.paytpv.com/en/documentacion/jet-bankstore

Classes/PTPVAPIClient.html#/c:objc(cs)PT.name: -infoUser:completion:
Classes/PTPVAPIClient.html#/c:objc(cs)PT.abstract: Returns the user information for the registered user.

Classes/PTPVAPIClient.html#/c:objc(cs)PT.name: -removeUser:completion:
Classes/PTPVAPIClient.html#/c:objc(cs)PT.abstract: Removes a user from the account of the business.

Classes/PTPVAPIClient.html#/c:objc(cs)PT.name: -executePurchase:forUser:completion:
Classes/PTPVAPIClient.html#/c:objc(cs)PT.abstract: Execute a payment with the user’s details.

Classes/PTPVAPIClient.html#/c:objc(cs)PT.name: -executePurchaseDCC:forUser:completion:
Classes/PTPVAPIClient.html#/c:objc(cs)PT.abstract: Execute a Dynamic currency conversion purchase with the user’s details.

Classes/PTPVAPIClient.html#/c:objc(cs)PT.name: -confirmPurchaseDCC:completion:
Classes/PTPVAPIClient.html#/c:objc(cs)PT.abstract: Confirms the currency for a dcc transaction.

Classes/PTPVAPIClient.html#/c:objc(cs)PT.name: -executeRefund:forUser:completion:
Classes/PTPVAPIClient.html#/c:objc(cs)PT.abstract: Refunds a purchase.

Classes/PTPVAPIClient.html#/c:objc(cs)PT.name: -createSubscription:withCard:completion:
Classes/PTPVAPIClient.html#/c:objc(cs)PT.abstract: Creates a subscription to the account of the business with the given credit card.

Classes/PTPVAPIClient.html#/c:objc(cs)PT.name: -createSubscription:withUser:completion:
Classes/PTPVAPIClient.html#/c:objc(cs)PT.abstract: Creates a subscription to the account of the business for a user that was already registered in the system, without it being necessary in this case to send card data again

Classes/PTPVAPIClient.html#/c:objc(cs)PT.name: -editSubscription:forUser:execute:completion:
Classes/PTPVAPIClient.html#/c:objc(cs)PT.abstract: Updates an existing subscription.

Classes/PTPVAPIClient.html#/c:objc(cs)PT.name: -removeSubscription:completion:
Classes/PTPVAPIClient.html#/c:objc(cs)PT.abstract: Removes a subscription from the account of the business.

Classes/PTPVAPIClient.html#/c:objc(cs)PT.name: -createPreauthorization:forUser:completion:
Classes/PTPVAPIClient.html#/c:objc(cs)PT.abstract: Creates a user preauthorization in the system.

Classes/PTPVAPIClient.html#/c:objc(cs)PT.name: -confirmPreauthorization:forUser:completion:
Classes/PTPVAPIClient.html#/c:objc(cs)PT.abstract: Confirms a preauthorization.

Classes/PTPVAPIClient.html#/c:objc(cs)PT.name: -cancelPreauthorization:forUser:completion:
Classes/PTPVAPIClient.html#/c:objc(cs)PT.abstract: Cancels a preauthorization.

Classes/PTPVAPIClient.html#/c:objc(cs)PT.name: -confirmDeferredPreauthorization:forUser:completion:
Classes/PTPVAPIClient.html#/c:objc(cs)PT.abstract: Confirms a deferred preauthorization in the system.

Classes/PTPVAPIClient.html#/c:objc(cs)PT.name: -cancelDeferredPreauthorization:forUser:completion:
Classes/PTPVAPIClient.html#/c:objc(cs)PT.abstract: Cancels a deferred preauthorization in the system.

Classes/PTPVAPIClient.html.name: PTPVAPIClient
Classes/PTPVAPIClient.html.abstract: A client for making requests to the PAYTPV API.

Classes/PTPVConfiguration.html.name: PTPVConfiguration
Classes/PTPVConfiguration.html.abstract: Represents the configuration of the contracted product.

Classes/PTPVUser.html.name: PTPVUser
Classes/PTPVUser.html.abstract: Represents the user registered in the system

Type Definitions.html.name: Type Definitions
Type Definitions.html.abstract: The following type definitions are available globally.
